# Installation

## Prerequisites
- Python 3.7+
- OpenAI API key

## Steps
1. Clone the repository:
    ```
    git clone https://github.com/basith-ahmed/langchain-cli-v2.git
    cd coding-copilot
    ```

2. Install the required packages:
    ```
    pip install -r requirements.txt
    ```

3. Configure your OpenAI API key:
    ```
    python cli.py configure
    ```
